subject: Question
msgSnippet: Hi everybody, I ve written a TestCase for one class. Is there a way to test another class with this test? The problem is: it is impossible to pass second one
messageBody:
Hi everybody,
I've written a TestCase for one class.
Is there a way to test another class with this test?
The problem is: it is impossible to pass second one as parameter to "Test
suite()" method (as it is static and passing will give one result: last class
will be tested twice).
Changing test is not really good (as there will be some more classes that I
would like to test with TestCase).

Thanks.
Sincerely yours, Vladimir.
